member.name: M:QEnergy.API.Controllers.API.AuthorizationController.Authorization(QEnergy.Core.Domain.Models.Authorization.AuthorizationModel)
member.summary: Get JWT authorization token
member.remarks: Get JWT authorization token by providing the client ApiKey and ApiSecret. If successful, a JWT authorization token will be retrieved

member.summary: Gets the projects list
member.returns: The list of all projects not deleted
member.response: The list of all projects not deleted
